title: Illaoi, the....
body:
...angry butch man-hater.

Not a comment on play - just what the login screen reminds me of right now.

replies.body:
True to a certain extent lol

(psst ellaowee is a feminist)
Nothing wrong with feminism. Just dont expect to have a rational conversation about the glass ceiling with this tentacle controlling lady.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Jqu348zJ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-25T09:14:23.853+0000)
>
> Just dont expect to have a rational conversation about the glass ceiling with this tentacle controlling lady.

omg yes this

Dont get me wrong - feminism still has a very important place to play in society as there are still gender equality issues which need resolving, particularly around addressing the pay gap and the changing nature of gender roles in the home.

But Illaoi has a look of blind hatred for sausages.

...WTF IS SHE DOING!

I just played against her for the first time without even bothering to read her skills, at first I was... very confused, but within 10 minutes or so was kicking her ass with one full combo.

She has great damage when built for it, but like all of those types she either does damage, or takes it, not both. And if she built defensively she would be useless at farming I think.

Once people learn to use her she's going to be problematic. I've already seen a few good Illaois out there, and their lane dominance is crazy. She doesn't fall off either because of her team fighting potential.

Yeh too bad the one I fought didn't even know the basics to the game, let alone how to use her correctly. She would either charge in 1v5 or farm top lane when we were in their base like a wrecking ball.
